statements: SELECT * FROM system_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_name, system_performance FROM system_reports WHERE alerts_count > 5;
SELECT id, report_date FROM system_reports WHERE incidents_count < 3;
SELECT system_performance, incidents_count FROM system_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM system_reports WHERE alerts_count + incidents_count < 10;
SELECT * FROM system_reports WHERE system_performance > 0.8 ORDER BY report_date DESC, alerts_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_name, system_performance FROM system_reports WHERE incidents_count > 10 AND alerts_count > 5 ORDER BY system_performance DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT id, report_name, report_date, system_performance FROM system_reports WHERE alerts_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM system_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, alerts_count, incidents_count FROM system_reports WHERE system_performance < 0.5 ORDER BY report_date ASC, alerts_count DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM system_performance_reports;
SELECT report_type, system_name FROM system_performance_reports WHERE report_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456';
SELECT report_id, report_date, performance_metrics FROM system_performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts_and_incidents WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT alert_id, incident_category, details FROM alerts_and_incidents WHERE alert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM system_performance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_type, system_name, performance_metrics->>'CPU' AS cpu_usage FROM system_performance_reports WHERE system_name = 'Server-01' AND performance_metrics->>'CPU' > '80';
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM system_performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY report_type;

SELECT system_name, AVG(cast(performance_metrics->>'Memory' as DECIMAL)) AS avg_memory_usage FROM system_performance_reports GROUP BY system_name HAVING AVG(cast(performance_metrics->>'Memory' as DECIMAL)) > 16;
SELECT report_date, report_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM system_performance_reports GROUP BY report_date, report_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_title, performance_rating FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_rating > 80
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical'
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM alerts
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_title, performance_rating FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_rating > 8 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type='High Priority' AND alert_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incidents GROUP BY incident_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_incidents DESC
SELECT report_title, incident_type FROM performance_reports JOIN incidents ON performance_reports.report_id = incidents.incident_id
SELECT * FROM SystemPerformance;
SELECT id, timestamp, cpu_usage FROM SystemPerformance WHERE cpu_usage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, reviewer, review_date FROM Review WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT system_id, incident_type, reported_by FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'hardware_failure'
SELECT id, timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM SystemPerformance WHERE cpu_usage > 50
SELECT id, system_id, alert_type, timestamp, details FROM Alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, system_id, incident_type, details, reported_by FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type='Critical'
SELECT id, incident_id, reviewer, review_date, status FROM Review WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SystemPerformance JOIN Alerts ON SystemPerformance.id = Alerts.system_id
SELECT * FROM SystemPerformanceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, performance_metric FROM SystemPerformanceReports WHERE performance_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM AlertLogs WHERE alert_type = 'warning' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SystemPerformanceReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, performance_metric FROM SystemPerformanceReports WHERE performance_metric > 0.5
SELECT Users.username, SystemUsers.system_role FROM Users INNER JOIN SystemUsers ON Users.user_id = SystemUsers.user_id
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM AlertLogs WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC
